DM Description: Switch between Demon Mode and Normal Mode.
AF Description: When enabled, units that meet the criteria are auto-favorited.
WAR_YEARS Description: How many years between a forced war or rebellion (default 30).
GC_YEARS Description: How many years between a Demon Ascension or Great Contest (default 480).
RESET_LOOP: World Reset & Cleanup (one-shot on next load)
RESET_LOOP Description: On = chambered. On next load/new world: reset year to 1 and wipe units, one time only, then auto-unchamber. The UI may still show On but it will not trigger again. To run again: turn Off, then On. Off = no action.
AUTO_SPAWN Description: When enabled, the world periodically spawns creatures on the map. Requires World Laws → Auto-spawn Animals (default Off).
WILD_CLEANUP Description: Default Off. When enabled: on each age update remove the “super_health” trait; wild units have a 90% chance to be executed.
STAT_PATCH Description: When enabled: units with ≥10 kills gain +100 Max HP and +2 Damage per kill. Compatible with other mod traits. Default Off.
SPECTATE_ON_HIT Description: Automatically switch to spectate when a unit is hit, prioritizing units carrying the “Demon Mask.”

trait_demon_bloodthirst_info: Healing cap 8% of Max HP. (1% chance on kill)
LOG_TXT Description: When enabled, writes world events and system info to TXT files under the logs directory.
LOG_DETAIL Description: Requires TXT Logging to be enabled. Appends more detailed data (kings, lords, regicides, city events, disasters, war outcomes, etc.).
trait_demon_env_immunity_desc: Immune to most environmental damage (e.g., fire, cold, burning, poison gas, acid rain, lightning, etc.).
trait_demon_env_immunity_description: Immune to most environmental damage (e.g., fire, cold, burning, poison gas, acid rain, lightning, etc.).
trait_demon_env_immunity_info: Unaffected by common environmental sources of sustained or instant damage. (Granted automatically at >30 kills)
trait_demon_kill_bonus_desc: Kills grant permanent growth: +100 Max HP and +2 Damage per kill (stacking handled by the mod).
trait_demon_kill_bonus_description: Kills grant permanent growth: +100 Max HP and +2 Damage per kill (stacking handled by the mod).
trait_demon_kill_bonus_info: Growth trait; scales with accumulated kills. (Granted automatically at >10 kills)
trait_rogue_heal_on_kill_info: Heal 500 HP after a kill. (Granted automatically at >5 kills)
